description: The sinister politician who controls the Titans from behind the scenes. From his perch at the pinnacle of the Earth Federation`s military command structure, Jamitov uses the Titans as a private army to further his own scheme for world domination. Cruel, devious, and utterly amoral, this evil genius will stop at nothing to impose his own brand of Earth-supremacist ideology on the suffering peoples of the space colonies.
name: Jamitov Hymem
